PAbout.text1: I am Erwan Jugand, I am {year} years old and I am a Front-End developer since my training at Digital Campus Rennes.
PAbout.text2: I like to develop websites with the latest technologies that can offer the browsers with a great interest in web integration often underestimated!
PAbout.text3: Whether it is the compression of images or the minification of code, optimization is my second nature!
PAbout.text4: Good practices are one of my directives to work well in team or sharing code.
PAbout.text5: I am passionate about computer science, new technologies and high-tech products.
PAbout.title: About
